subject: Gymnastics
Sex Crimes
Olympic Games
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: USA Gymnastics said it was aware of allegations of sexual abuse, which were first reported in The Orange Country Register, against Don Peters, who coached the women’s team at the 1984 Olympics.
snippet: USA Gymnastics said it was aware of allegations of sexual abuse, which were first reported in The Orange Country Register, against Don Peters, who coached the women’s team at the 1984 Olympics.
